name: air bent - eyes kissed
description:
This is an interactive version of "air bent - eyes kissed": a short text and video created through rapid cuts of existing material and minds: http://www.kristallaffe.eu/air-bent-eyes-kissed/

Music by Aporie (Angst): https://aporie.bandcamp.com/releases

Controls:

W A S D - move
Mouse - look around
Left Mouse Button - Zoom in 
Right Mouse Button - Zoom out
Quit - ESC
